messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I sure do like the sound of that new station that can be accessed via the teleporter in the bar, it sounds pretty cool

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a horde of energy draining parasites have swarmed into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Medbay.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Looks like the new station nearby has gotten pretty heated with us for taking up the whole station market. We are getting teleport signatures headed your way from their station.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The nearby station appears to be kidnapping staff, eyes open crew. Remember, we own you.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
